definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

to leak/to expose (sb's secret)/to spill the beans/to let the cat out of the bag

definition: to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum

definition: to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
